title.narrative: ECLOF Peru - Institution Building and Financial Management Training 2015

description.narrative: The program aims to improve the living conditions of disadvantaged children, youth, women and men in urban, rural and suburban areas. ECLOF Peru is strategically promoting financial education and management training with the goal of strengthening decision-making in savings, avoidance of debt to other financial institutions, standardization of training modules and business plans for increased productivity and accelerated growth of micro-enterprises. Training is not limited to financial topics and in fact includes education on such topics as agro-business, family dynamics, health and hygiene, micro insurance, and personal development. Aligning with its 2015-2017 business plan, ECLOF Peru in 2015 will develop new products, increase and continue training in rural areas, improve institutional visibility and market presence, and address infrastructure/personnel training needs in the central office. Restructuring of the organization occurred throughout 2014 with Episcopal Relief & Development support and the process will conclude in 2015 leading to increased operational efficiency of ECLOF Peru and better support of clients.
